Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: The pastry doesn't look so bad.
Speaker.line2: But itâ€™s obviously missing the fragrant.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line2: I can still smell the dirty grass outside.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line2: I guess I'll have to tolerate it.
Speaker.line3: It's a rare chance that I could rely on a middle-class like you anyway.
